Description.Text:
Club Quarters is a private, full service hotel adjacent to the Embarcadero Center with over 100 retail shops and restaurants and just 4 blocks from the historic Ferry Building. A short walk to Market Street and most downtown points of interest, such as Union Square, Chinatown, and North Beach. Just off the California Street cable car line. and a brief ride to Fisherman's Wharf. Convenient to the South of Market District (SoMa) with its selection of museums, galleries, restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Ideal for both business and leisure travelers with 24 hour concierge services and fitness facility. Parking is available across the street at 1 Embarcadero Center Garage, enter on Battery Street between Clay and Sacramento Streets. The cost is $32 plus applicable taxes for 24 hours with no in and out privileges. Cost is $36 + tax with in and out privileges. Charges posted at the Front Desk.
Other amenities include free high-speed Internet access, free chilled bottled water, and comfortable beds with premium linens. Private Club Room with complimentary newspapers, magazines, coffee and tea. Rooms are comfortable, elegantly styled and beautifully appointed, with all modern conveniences.

Club Quarters San Francisco at 424 Clay St, at Embarcadero Center, is in the center of the prime business and financial district and kitty corner from Embarcadero Center, the citys most prestigious office complex, with shopping, movies and restaurants.

Standard Room - One queen bed with premium mattress and premium linens. Other features include contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
Superior with Kitchenette - Oversized room with one queen bed and kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium mattress and premium linens, contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a rollaway - available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
One Room Suite with Kitchenette - One queen bed with kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium mattress and premium linens, contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a chairbed or rollaway -available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
Club Size - One full or queen bed with premium mattress and premium linens. Other features include contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, MP3 alarm clock radio with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
